course_description: This course focuses on the application of principles, techniques, and devices used in the care of adult patients requiring perfusion management. Advanced beginner level.
prerequisites: CVP 583 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1595, Section #: 1, Type: CLN, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 2-4:20p, Instructor: McNair/Williams, Status: Open
